content: In 2019, which South Korean film won the Palme d'Or at Cannes Film Festival and later went on to win Best Picture at the Oscars?

The South Korean film that won the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival in 2019 and later went on to win Best Picture at the Oscars is "Parasite," directed by Bong Joon-ho. This film made history by being the first non-English language film to win the Academy Award for Best Picture.
